subject: My order issues, Missing items
description_text: My order has been delivered, but I'm concerned about where the faceplate and pedals for the Haptic Pro are? With the plate together, it should be around $500. I'm expected to get things ready on time before my holiday break starts.  I have a few pictures that I hope can be resolved soon.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jay Trias,  Your VAM Pro motor was likely shipped separately. Please provide your order number so I can check the details for you.

Order #SSN4157

I didn't get everything that I wanted as well, and I'm going on vacation very soon and likely won't be back by the mid of January. May i change up the address?

Hi Jay Trias,    Sorry for the delayed response. Here's the tracking link for the pedal:  https://www.ups.com/track?loc=en_US&requester=ST&trackNums=1ZJ201H40331265346/trackdetails  Here's the link for the base plate:  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=396662183086&trkqual=12029~396662183086~FDEG  Here is the link for the VAM Pro:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047112544563
